nodes.text: @HowdyDinduu  we have jails for people who break the law, not morgues.
@HowdyDinduu if Charlotte PD releases the video then perhaps we can see if he had a book or not. I'll trust video over a cop's "sacred" word
@HowdyDinduu it is possible to protest "black on black" crime and police brutality. We've been known to walk and chew gum at the same time
@HowdyDinduu yes all we negroes do is loot CVS's.....that's all the black race lives for. Sure buddy
@HowdyDinduu you don't seem convinced but it's not surprising......people believe what they want to believe. Facts be damned
@HowdyDinduu i have personally witnessed quite a few Stop The Violence rallies in my lifetime...but like i said it doesn't fit the narrative
@HowdyDinduu people do protest against "black on black crime" but people conviently ignore that because it does not fit their narrative
